changeSet.createView: SELECT mrc.user + 167 * mro.user AS id, CONCAT(puc.first_name, ' ', puc.last_name, ' (', puc.login, ')') AS user_from, mrc.user AS user_from_id, CONCAT(puo.first_name, ' ', puo.last_name, ' (', puo.login, ')') AS user_to, mro.user AS user_to_id, SUM(ROUND(mrc.value * mro.value / mt.value, 2)) AS charge FROM mod_transaction mt LEFT JOIN mod_redistribution mrc ON mrc.parent = mt.id AND mrc.type = 'C' LEFT JOIN mod_redistribution mro ON mro.parent = mrc.parent AND mro.type = 'O' LEFT JOIN prv_user puc ON puc.id = mrc.user LEFT JOIN prv_user puo ON puo.id = mro.user GROUP BY user_from_id, user_to_id, id, user_from, user_to;
